allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: LeadSynergy lead management platform

Full-stack application with Python/FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend
for real estate lead management and CRM integration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: support both env var naming conventions

- FUB_API_KEY or FOLLOWUPBOSS_API_KEY
- SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY or SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: support SUPABASE_JWT_SECRET in all database files

- Updated supabase_client.py
- Updated auth.py
- Updated migrations.py

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd.exe //c "start ""LeadSynergy Frontend"" cmd /k ""cd /d C:\\Users\\adamm\\Projects\\LeadSynergy\\Frontend && npm run dev""")
